message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it worthwhile for both of us.
Come on, meet me in the middle, 58% for me is a good deal
This is a fair split considering the time pressure and inflation working against you, Alice.
Inflation is biting, but I still think 56% is a reasonable ask
Alice, the clock is ticking and your potential gains are shrinking.  This offer benefits us both.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a bit more than half
Alice, this is it - my final offer. It's a very slight edge for me, but with inflation eroding your gains every round, you're better off taking this deal now and ensuring we both benefit.
